name: Unto The Castle
description:
During a time of absolute peril, one courageous knight must save his kingdom from the wretched grasp of the powerful wizard Bezosus.

You will embark on a dangerous quest, fighting off enemies in your bid to save the kingdom.

Controls:

A & D to move 

Space or W to jump 

Left Click to Normal Attack 

Right Click to Magic Attack

Scroll Wheel to Change Magic
